title: Linda Watkins Research Support Fund
description: To provide support for Dr. Linda Watkins research in Psychology at the University of Colorado Boulder, devoted to developing and bringing to clinical use new and effective therapeutics for chronic pain, for people, companion (pet) dogs, and horses.
marketingContent: To provide support for Dr. Linda Watkins research in Psychology at the University of Colorado Boulder, devoted to developing and bringing to clinical use new and effective therapeutics for chronic pain, for people, companion (pet) dogs, and horses.
